content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Mary. I'm glad you're interested. I do have a few questions for you. Can you tell me a bit more about your background and why you're looking to rent in Mannheim?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am a student studying at the University of Mannheim. I am looking for a place to rent for the next academic year. I am dependable and responsible, I want to be on good terms with the landlord. I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible, so I am willing to negotiate.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Understood, Mary. I appreciate your interest in my apartment and your willingness to negotiate. Based on the information you've provided, I would be willing to rent the apartment to you for a price of 450 Euros per month. This includes all utilities and other expenses that will be included in your monthly rent.

Is this a price that works for you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate. Could you give me a breakdown of what the monthly rent includes?

Also, I am concerned about the size of the apartment. 25 square meters is quite small. Can you provide more information about the layout of the room and any other features that might make the space more comfortable?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Of course, Mary. The monthly rent of 450 Euros includes all utilities, including electricity, water, and gas. It also includes maintenance costs and any other expenses that may arise during your tenancy.

As for the size of the apartment, I understand your concern. However, I assure you that the apartment is well-designed and has ample storage space. The room is also bright and airy, with large windows that provide plenty of natural light. Additionally, the apartment is located in a prime location in Mannheim, close to many shops, restaurants, and transportation options.

I'm open to discussing any concerns you may have and finding a mutually agreeable solution. Would you be willing to discuss further?
name: Heinrich Heine
